name: Wizard's Wastes
description:
A short game about a wizard trying to complete their thesis and heal a scarred land.

Demo consisting of the first three days published for GMTK2021 with plans for more.

Original art: Birdie

Code: Dragonn

Music: https://tallbeard.itch.io/

SFX: https://kenney.itch.io/

Tilesets: https://iknowkingrabbit.itch.io/
